title: Password and Login Issues
description: Troubleshooting account access and password problems.

steps.title: Check Caps Lock
steps.instruction: Ensure Caps Lock is OFF. Passwords are case-sensitive.

steps.title: Verify Username
steps.instruction: Double-check you're using the correct username or email address.

steps.title: Wait for Account Unlock
steps.instruction: If account is locked due to multiple failed attempts, wait 15-30 minutes before trying again.

steps.title: Use Password Reset
steps.instruction: Click 'Forgot Password' link and follow the email instructions to reset your password.

steps.title: Contact IT Support
steps.instruction: If password reset doesn't work, raise a ticket for IT support to manually unlock your account.
